alert.note: Alert for Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 06 at 4:58PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of West Baton Rouge, southeastern Pointe Coupee and northwestern Iberville Parishes through 530 PM CDT... At 457 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Ramah, or 14 miles west of Plaquemine, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Port Allen, Addis, Brusly, Livonia, Maringouin, Rosedale, Grosse Tete and Ramah. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 129 and 154. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Iberville; Pointe Coupee; West Baton Rouge
